codex.install_help_windows:
Codex CLI is not installed or not in PATH.

To install Codex CLI on Windows:
1. Visit: https://developers.openai.com/codex/cli
2. Download the Windows installer
3. Run the installer
4. Restart this application

Expected executable names: codex.exe, codex.cmd
codex.install_help_unix:
Codex CLI is not installed or not in PATH.

To install Codex CLI:
1. Visit: https://developers.openai.com/codex/cli
2. Follow installation instructions
3. Ensure 'codex' is in your PATH
4. Restart this application
